name: SN Core
description: The first Open Source Enterprise Content Management platform for .NET.

name: SN Installer
description: A desktop application for installing Sense/Net ECM from scratch, or executing upgrade packages.

name: SN Admin
description: Upgrade and package executor tool for Sense/Net ECM.

name: SN Tools
description: General .Net tools that can be used even in Sense/Net-independent projects.

name: SN Taskmanager
description: A standalone .Net component for managing long-running background tasks in any application.

name: SN Security
description: A powerful .Net component for managing permission entries in content repositories.

name: SN Client .NET
description: A .Net client for Sense/Net ECM that makes it easy to use the REST API of the Content Repository.

name: SN Client JS
description: A JavaScript client for Sense/Net ECM that makes it easy to use the REST API of the Content Repository.

name: SN Redux
description: A set of redux actions, reducers and redux-ovbservable epics for Sense/Net ECM.

name: SN Benchmark
description: A benchmark tool to measure the performance of a Sense/Net ECM instance across changes.

name: SenseNet Filesize Report Generator
description: This is a tool which generates reports about the file sizes in the SenseNet ECM.

name: SenseNet Project Installer
description: Dev project installer for Sense/Net ECMS.

name: SenseNet Subtree Lucene Fixer
description: Custom ContentCollection view to compare repository content structure and lucene index structure of a subtree, and try to fix any differences.

name: Todo App with React, Redux and Sense/Net ECM
Todo App with Angular, Redux and Sense/Net ECM
Todo App with Angular2, Redux and Sense/Net ECM
Todo App with Aurelia, Redux and Sense/Net ECM
Todo App with Vue, Redux and Sense/Net ECM
